title: Executive Order 12126-Correction to Executive Order 12107 Related to Federal Civil Service Reorganization
content: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution of the United States of America, and in order to delete an erroneous reference to a revoked Executive order in Executive Order No. 12107 of December 28, 1978, relating to the Civil Service Commission and Labor-Management in the Federal Service, the number "11512" is deleted from Section 2-101(b) of that Order.

JIMMY CARTER
The White House,
March 29, 1979.
citation: Jimmy Carter, Executive Order 12126-Correction to Executive Order 12107 Related to Federal Civil Service Reorganization Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/249409
